title: Chainsaw Detection
description: Use a microphone to identify if a chainsaw is actively cutting nearby.
long_description: This project allows you to build a model that classifies if there is an actively cutting chainsaw in the vicinity. Chainsaws that are stalling are defined as not cutting. A fully developed model could be used to detect illegal logging or create automatic warning systems.
